job_tasks.phrase: Oplossingsarchitectuur definiëren en bijdragen aan de ontwikkeling van de enterprise-architectuur voor GenAI-omgevingen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes defining solution architecture and contributing to enterprise architecture, which involves understanding the broader business context and aligning technical solutions with strategic goals.

job_tasks.phrase: GenAI-oplossingen ontwerpen, bouwen en beheren binnen Azure Cloud
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions designing and building GenAI solutions, which falls under software development, especially when referring to creating functional applications.

job_tasks.phrase: De ontwikkeling van GenAI-gestuurde applicaties stimuleren met behulp van zowel low-code als high-code benaderingen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly states stimulating the development of GenAI-driven applications, which is a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: transparantie wordt gewaarborgd in zowel prestaties als kosten.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring transparency in performance and costs relates to understanding the business impact and management of the implemented solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met verschillende teams om vereisten te verzamelen
job_tasks.justification: Collecting requirements from different teams is a key aspect of understanding business needs and translating them into technical requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met verschillende teams om vereisten te verzamelen
Op de hoogte blijven van de nieuwste trends in GenAI en Microsoft Azure Cloud om onze digitale initiatieven te verbeteren.
Kennis delen en teamleden begeleiden om een cultuur van leren en innovatie te bevorderen.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes designing, building, and managing GenAI solutions and applications, aligning directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The mention of low-code/high-code approaches for GenAI-driven applications further solidifies this classification.
